mng: residence, (coll.) to stay in at home, to hang around at home

exm.mng: residence, (coll.) to stay in at home, to hang around at home
male addicted to computers, computer games, adult cartoons etc (2000s Taiwan slang, derived from Japanese otaku 御宅男 house male), fan of computer games, by extension, nerd
female geek, female nerd, otaku girl
otaku, a Japanese term for people with obsessive interests such as anime, manga, and video games, see also 宅男[zhai2 nan2], see also 宅女[zhai2 nu:3]
one of the earliest classics about Fengshui, see also 黃帝宅經|黄帝宅经[huang2 di4 zhai2 jing1]
one of the earliest classics about Fengshui
to choose a capital by divination, to choose a home, to choose one's burial place by divination
